text: we will manufacture professional ovens
for restaurants canteens hotels
supermarkets gas station food service
equipment so we usually sell to a dealer
that sells to an user and a lot of time
we don't know really how the oven is
used in the in the field we already had
the positive experience in product
digitalization with the internet of
things and in customer experience with
Amazon connect so we were sure that we
could also embed some of the AWS
Technologies inside the products itself
in order to have a better and smarter
product and with this kind of services
like with a Time SDK we are able to call
the customer in the device itself and
support it in real time when he has a
fault or he asks for a suggestion on how
to improve a cooking recipe
Etc in the last two years we embed
AWS services and Technologies in the
product and we created a better and
smarter digital product that can shift
the perception and of the user
experience in our industry to a more
digital environment and space
